description: This vegan macaroni salad without mayo is ideal for a refreshing, summer side dish. With balsamic tofu and a tangy, subtly sweet dressing, it's also super easy to make in around 35 minutes.
keywords: cucumber, earth of maria, nutritional yeast, tamari, to move, Tofu, tomatoes, Vegetables
name: Vegan Macaroni Salad Without Mayo

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tofu, tamari, dried basil and dried thyme to a mixing bowl. Stir together well, then marinade for 30 minutes (preferably overnight for best results).
Cook the macaroni according to packaging instructions.

Drain and rinse the macaroni, then transfer it to a large mixing bowl together with the red bell pepper, green bell pepper, tomatoes, cucumber, cilantro, red onion, olive oil, salt, balsamic glaze, maple syrup, nutritional yeast and lemon juice. Stir together well.
Add the tofu together with the marinade and stir together once more.
Serve immediately with the capers and pumpkin seeds.
